Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Residhome Marseille Saint Charles in Marseille (3rd Arrondissement), you'll be minutes from University of Aix-Marseille I and close to La Vieille Charite. This residence is within close proximity of Jardin des Vestiges and Musee d'Histoire de Marseille.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 103 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Residhome Marseille Saint Charles.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Residhome Marseille Saint Charles.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Residhome Marseille Saint Charles in Marseille (3rd Arrondissement), you'll be minutes from University of Aix-Marseille I and close to La Vieille Charite. This residence is within close proximity of Jardin des Vestiges and Musee d'Histoire de Marseille.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

University of Aix-Marseille I - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Jardin des Vestiges - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Musee d'Histoire de Marseille - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Centre Bourse - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Musee de la Marine - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Saint Vincent de Paul Church - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Musee d'Archeologie Mediterraneenne - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Centre de la Vieille Charite - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
La Vieille Charite - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Marseille Tourism Office - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Vieux Port - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Hotel de Ville - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Docks of Joliette - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Grand Port Maritime de Marseille - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Marseille Opera House - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Aix-en-Provence (QXB-Aix en Provence TGV Train Station) - 17.7 km / 11 mi
Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 20 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for Residhome Marseille Saint Charles is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
